rComments: Eaton is fantastic. Loved his class, and his lecture style. He is clear, extremely passionate about Latin American affairs, and provides essay prompts that are dynamic and workable. Absolutely love Professor Eaton.

Professor Eaton is seriously awesome. He is so engaging and makes this stuff interesting. I've taken LA poli before and knew much of the material but he managed to make it interesting regardless. Post slides online which is good because he does talk fast. Overall, good core class.

Kent is simply amazing! His expectations are fairly high and is always willing to help his students. I was quite unsure about Politics as my major until I took this class. 1 in class midterm (5 short answer prompts), 1 paper (3-4 pages) and in-class final (3 essay questions). Higher chances of doing well in the class if you visit during office hrs.
HE IS AWESOME! Really helpful and he really wants to see his students to succeed. A lot of dense readings but you can learn a lot by just going to his lectures

Dr. Eaton is an amazing professor. He is clear and concise, knowledgeable and flexible. Lectures were interesting. The midterm and final were tough, but if you do the assigned work and pay attention in class you're sure to do well. There's also a paper. I found the prompt very challenging, but he was incredibly accessible!

this would be a perfect class if attendance wasn't mandatory to discussion. Attendance not mandatory to lecture. Professor provides all material online. Eaton has a rare air of humility for ucsc professor. Truly professional recommended.

The best Politics professor ever! Highly HIGHLY recommend taking this course with Eaton. He is super helpful and a fair grader. If you do the readings and go to lecture you will go GREAT. His is also very approchable.

Easily the best politics teacher at Santa Cruz. Although the TA I had that quarter was a total snatch and sections are mandatory, Professor Eaton is fun guy who knows his material and is actually interested in teaching, not TALKING at you like some of the other politics professors.

Good class; interesting but got boring toward the end. Lectures were helpful even though he posts slides online- I recommend going because he reviews authors in class, which is helpful for the papers. The sections were mandatory, & useless unless you speak Spanish and can go to his instead of the other TAs meetings. Overall I don't recommend it

Professor Eaton is awesome. He's very helpful, the lectures are really interesting, and he is great at clarifying material and making it easy to understand. Beware, though, TONS of reading and the tests and assignments are fair but pretty tough.

Interesting class, lectures not mandatory and slides from them online so attendance at lecture not essential to do well.  1 midterm (inclass), 1 paper (5-7 pgs) and final 2 take home papers (each 5-7 pgs).  class was challenging but if you have any interest in Latin American politics, should be a must. some readings a little dry but could skim them

Professor Eaton was an amazing professor.  He is extremely knowledgeable overall, but especially about history and politics in Latin America.  I learned a bundle in his class, and as long as you attend the lectures, the class is relatively easy.  Again - awesome professor!
